0.text: Innate: Dr. Mundo  regenerates an additional「 0.8% − 1.6% (based on level) of his maximum health every 5 seconds. 」「 0.16% − 0.32% (based on level) of his maximum health each second. 」

1.text: Passive: Periodically, Dr. Mundo gains immunity to the  immobilizing effects of the next hostile spell to affect him. Upon resisting one, Dr. Mundo pays a health cost equal to 7% of his current health and propels a canister that lands 525 units in the general direction of its source, remaining on the ground for 7 seconds.

2.text: Dr. Mundo can move near the canister to consume it,  healing himself for 8% of his maximum health and  reducing the cooldown of Goes Where He Pleases by 15 seconds. Enemy  champions can move near it to destroy it.

3.text: Goes Where He Pleases' cooldown  resets upon respawning.

0.text: Active: Dr. Mundo throws an infected bonesaw in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slows them by 40% for 2 seconds.

1.text: Infected Bonesaw has a minimum damage threshold, and is capped against  monsters.

2.text: If the bonesaw hits an enemy, Dr. Mundo  heals for 50% of the health cost, increased to 100% against  champions or  monsters.

0.text: Active: Dr. Mundo charges up a defibrillator for up-to 4 seconds, dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies and storing a portion of the post-mitigation damage he takes as grey health on his health bar.

1.text: Heart Zapper can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration.

2.text: Recast: Dr. Mundo detonates the defibrillator, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  heals for 50% of grey health, increased to 100% if at least one enemy  champion or large  monster is hit.

0.text: Passive: Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage, plus an additional amount based on his missing health, reaching maximum value at 70% missing health.

1.text: Active: Dr. Mundo's next basic attack within 4 seconds is empowered to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  50 bonus range, and deal bonus physical damage, increased by 0% − 60% (based on missing health). If the target dies or is a small  monster, they are sent flying away in a line, though not through terrain, causing all enemies they pass through to take 100% AD plus Blunt Force Trauma's minimum bonus damage.

2.text: Blunt Force Trauma as well as the triggering attack's damage is increased to 200% against  minions and non-epic  monsters.

3.text: Blunt Force Trauma  resets Dr. Mundo's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Dr. Mundo injects himself with chemicals to become enhanced for 10 seconds, gaining increased  base health,  bonus attack damage,  bonus movement speed, and  regenerating health.

Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Endure: After taking damage from a champion or large monster, gain health regeneration equal to 0 − 40 (based on current missing health) health over 8 seconds. Reduced to 66% effectiveness on ranged champions or when triggered by AoE, DoT or proc effects.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.
Unique – Snowbind: Basic attacks create a 250 radius frost field around the target that lasts for 1.5 seconds and deals ( 12 − 85 / 6 − 42.5) (based on level) magic damage to all enemies inside initially and slows all enemies within by ( 25% / 12.5%) (+ ( 4% / 2%) per 1000 maximum health) for 1.5 seconds (( 4 / 6) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 100 bonus health and 6% increased size.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.

passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. 1.concerningText: Recast: Dr. Mundo detonates the defibrillator, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  heals for 50% of grey health, increased to 100% if at least one enemy  champion or large  monster is hit.

0.concerningText: Passive: Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage, plus an additional amount based on his missing health, reaching maximum value at 70% missing health.

1.concerningText: Active: Dr. Mundo's next basic attack within 4 seconds is empowered to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  50 bonus range, and deal bonus physical damage, increased by 0% − 60% (based on missing health). If the target dies or is a small  monster, they are sent flying away in a line, though not through terrain, causing all enemies they pass through to take 100% AD plus Blunt Force Trauma's minimum bonus damage.

0.concerningText: Active: Dr. Mundo injects himself with chemicals to become enhanced for 10 seconds, gaining increased  base health,  bonus attack damage,  bonus movement speed, and  regenerating health.
